description.en: A question where students select one correct answer from multiple options.
description.nl: Een vraag waarbij studenten één correct antwoord selecteren uit meerdere opties.

settings.name: Multiple choice answer options
settings.description: An array of options objects, with each option being an object with {value: string, correct: boolean}. The value can contain HTML, the `correct` boolean indicates if the option is correct. There can only be a single correct option.
